# whoami

- Execute

    ```bash
    # Displays info about me
    $ npx luisnquin@latest
    ```

- Or just read this:

    ```nix
    {
      me = rec {
        os = "NixOS";
        betd = "ðŸŒ‚";
        # We don't fix the cause, we count panics
        kernelPanicsCounter = 3;
      };
    }
    ```
